channel.title: Please help! i need help fast!
channel.description: well.. i wanna make npc's drop better stuff, im making a donator zone i made shops,and all the rest i made training skilling for them and now the npc's i made there they drop crap stuff,and i wana make them drop really good stuff,like donators should deserve good stuff because they are giving money just for a game.. i wanna know how to make the npc's drop like d claws,vesta,coins because it will be easyer for them to get money

item.title: Please help! i need help fast!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

go to npcdrops.cfg and add this

npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID AMOUNT 10
10 have to be there

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! i need help fast!
